bottling(uint256,uint256,address).details: describe the bottling process of the OilProduction.

buyBottle(uint256,address,uint256).details: describe the process of buying a bottle.

params._upc: Universal Product Code, identifier to fetch a bottle in the supply chain.

deliver(uint256,address,uint256,address).details: describe the bottling process of the OilProduction.

params._upc: Universal Product Code, identifier to fetch a bottle in the supply chain.

fetchOilProduction(uint256).details: fetch the oil production data from the mill and shop perspective.

fetchOilProductionFarm(uint256).details: fetch the oil production data from the farm perspective.

getDelivery(uint256,uint256,uint256,addr.details: describe the process of putting the bottles into the shop.

harvest(uint256,address,string,uint256,s.details: describe the harvest as the first step of the OilProduction.

press(uint256,address,string,uint256,uin.details: describe the oil pressing process of the OilProduction.

params._amountLiters: the number of liters of pressed oil.

bottling(uint256,uint256,address).notice: emit the Bottled Event. Only a miller can trigger the method if the state is press (Pressed).

buyBottle(uint256,address,uint256).notice: emit the Sold Event. Only a customer can trigger the method if the state is in shop (InShop) and the customer pay enough.

deliver(uint256,address,uint256,address).notice: emit the Delivered Event. Only a miller can trigger the method if the state is bottle (Bottled).

getDelivery(uint256,uint256,uint256,addr.notice: emit the InShop Event. Only a shop can trigger the method if the state is deliver (Delivered).

harvest(uint256,address,string,uint256,s.notice: emit the Harvested Event. Only farmers can trigger this method.

isOwner().notice: Check if the calling address is the owner of the contract

owner().notice: Look up the address of the owner

press(uint256,address,string,uint256,uin.notice: emit the Pressed Event. Only a miller can trigger the method if the state is harvest (Harvested).

renounceOwnership().notice: Define a function to renounce ownerhip

transferOwnership(address).notice: Define a public function to transfer ownership

userdoc.notice: Organic Oil Manufacturer SupplyChain implementation for farmer to customer.
